+                ++matches_;
+                group->matches[it->path] = vector<match_context>();

+                        m->paths.push_back(*it);
+                        found = true;
+                        break;
+                    }
+                }
+                if (!found) {
+                    git->second.push_back(ctx);
+                    git->second.back().paths.push_back(*it);
+                }
             }
         }
+
